channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 08:25 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 08:25 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 07:37 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages.

item.title: 游리 06:42 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Manganets and Manganetsk Territorial Community - Myrivsk Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivsk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 06:42 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Manganets and Manganetsk Territorial Community - Myrivsk Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivsk Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_Oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 06:23 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 06:23 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
